Computes a power of a compressed pairing of two elliptic curve points, that is, . This is a high-level version of the function.

Parameters:
[in,out] env - the library context
[out] e - the result of the pairing computation
[in] point_p - the first point
[in] point_q - the second point, in the twisted curve
[in] exponent - the power, can be NULL
[in] parameters - the cryptosystem parameters
[in] ctx - the OpenSSL context
Returns:
LIBLESS_OK if no error occurs, LIBLESS_ERROR otherwise.

BIGNUM *  yq,
EC_GROUP *  group,
BN_CTX *  ctx 
) [static]

Adds two points and avaliates the contribution of the addition using a third point specified by its coordinates.

Parameters:
[in,out] env - the library context
[out] r - the resulting point after the addition
[out] line - the line avaliated at the third point
[in] a - the first point to add
[in] b - the second point to add
[in] xq - the x-coordinate of the third point
[in] yq - the y-coordinate of the third point
[in] group - the elliptic curve group
[in] ctx - the OpenSSL context
Returns:
LIBLESS_OK if no error occurs, LIBLESS_ERROR otherwise.
